__e: There's nothing more in the world I want more than for Louise to marry your son.
I'm sure that's why Louise and I are still alive. Our Blessed Mother.
Sam, Louise and I love you two. Now, if there's anything we can...
Considering the lack of support she's had, I think Louise has done a really good job.
I don't know how Louise stayed so calm.
And I saw the photo that you had Louise steal.
